text: The 2017 Icelandic Indoor Athletics Championships () was the year's national indoor track and field championships for Iceland. It was held from 18–19 February at Laugardalshöll in Reykjavík. A total of 26 national championship events (divided evenly between the sexes) were held. It served as the selection meeting for Iceland at the 2017 European Athletics Indoor Championships. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |60 metres |Ari Bragi Kárason|| 7.00 |Björgvin Brynjarsson|| 7.07 |Juan
